# changes in this file.

add_library(essentials-core-common_opt)


target_compile_options(essentials-core-common_opt PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(essentials-core-common_opt PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yql-essentials-core
  essentials-core-expr_nodes
  essentials-parser-pg_catalog
  library-cpp-disjoint_sets
)
